text: Ariana Grande defends her decision to name a song after her fiancé Pete Davidson. Sweetener features a track called ` ` Pete.'' After unveiling the official tracklist for her forthcoming album, several Grande fans questioned her decision to name one after the Saturday Night Live comedian. ` ` He is my fiancé. This is my album. I am an honest and emotional artist and human being and if my openness in my work isn't for you, that's OK ; I won't be offended. Still wishing y'all all the love in the world,'' replied Grande. Sweetener also features ` ` No Tears Left to Cry,'' ` ` The Light Is Coming,'' ` ` God Is A Woman,'' ` ` Better Off, '
